analysis.description:
WorldCryptoCup.teamsAreInitiated (/unique_chucks/8/0xaf21ae125cb7c6fb29798b5835b806aeb6cd9aae.sol#20-21) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- InitiateTeams (/unique_chucks/8/0xaf21ae125cb7c6fb29798b5835b806aeb6cd9aae.sol#119-152)

WorldCryptoCup.ceoAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xaf21ae125cb7c6fb29798b5835b806aeb6cd9aae.sol#5-6)
WorldCryptoCup.cfoAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xaf21ae125cb7c6fb29798b5835b806aeb6cd9aae.sol#6-8)
WorldCryptoCup.teamsAreInitiated should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xaf21ae125cb7c6fb29798b5835b806aeb6cd9aae.sol#20-21)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/8/0xaf21ae125cb7c6fb29798b5835b806aeb6cd9aae.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/8/0xaf21ae125cb7c6fb29798b5835b806aeb6cd9aae.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_countryId' of WorldCryptoCup.purchaseCountry (/unique_chucks/8/0xaf21ae125cb7c6fb29798b5835b806aeb6cd9aae.sol#42) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_teamId' of WorldCryptoCup.modifyPriceCountry (/unique_chucks/8/0xaf21ae125cb7c6fb29798b5835b806aeb6cd9aae.sol#65-66) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_newPrice' of WorldCryptoCup.modifyPriceCountry (/unique_chucks/8/0xaf21ae125cb7c6fb29798b5835b806aeb6cd9aae.sol#66) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_teamId' of WorldCryptoCup.getTeam (/unique_chucks/8/0xaf21ae125cb7c6fb29798b5835b806aeb6cd9aae.sol#74) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_teamId' of WorldCryptoCup.getTeamPrice (/unique_chucks/8/0xaf21ae125cb7c6fb29798b5835b806aeb6cd9aae.sol#86-88) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_teamId' of WorldCryptoCup.getTeamOwner (/unique_chucks/8/0xaf21ae125cb7c6fb29798b5835b806aeb6cd9aae.sol#91-94) is not in mixedCase
